title: Maison de the Bonte Divine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Calm-atmospheric internet cafe serves home-style comfort food in a small kitchen. Tea house (infusions and tea leaves, choice of organic, few fair trade). Has some vegan food like tofu, beans, quinoa for proteins, soup as a meal, sandwiches, porridges, salad and others that can be made vegan, but no vegan pastries. Eco-friendly. Free Wi-Fi, smooth music. French and English spoken.
